rows.label: tlk70000020_01_msg0001
rows.name:
Did you know that this splendid garden
was made for the first king of Iira?

rows.label: tlk70000020_01_msg0002
rows.name:
The placement of the stones and the
patterns in the sand are meant to
reflect the natural world we're part of.

rows.label: tlk70000020_01_msg0003
rows.name:
But do you know for what purpose the
garden was made, and why this
location in particular was chosen?

rows.label: tlk70000020_01_msg0004
rows.name:
The intention was that seeing this
garden would keep the viewer from
losing their grounding in nature.

rows.label: tlk70000020_01_msg0005
rows.name:
Ancient Iirans thought it of the
utmost importance, and the current
king is keeping this tradition alive, too.

rows.label: tlk70000020_01_msg0006
rows.name:
The king sounds like he cares about
the Divine Beast a great deal... Now, isn't that
a ruler we can all be proud of?
